entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Nakina)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:31 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 35 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
